ygData.subject: RE: General for Evil races
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry not that big of an issue. Evil races are harder by definition and actually I ve found a lot of zones where I can sell.. Next time you are in Cazic or Guk
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry not that big of an issue. Evil races are harder by definition and
actually I've found a lot of zones where I can sell.. Next time you are in
Cazic or Guk ask the "good" races how easy it is to sell. I do a quick run
to Oggok or Grobb they have to run to either the Gypsies in Rthe Mnts or
there is the Erudite in S. Ro. Most of the places you mention are on Faydwer
which is intentional harder for the evil races..

Anyway.. Enjoy..

Thom


-----Original Message-----
From: Cronik [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 11:53 AM
To: Shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] General for Evil races


Brian,

I know you said you would not answer non-SK related email, but this one does
in a way.

Why is it that only the evil races must zone to get to a merchant? Every
other zone, with the exception of Dungeons, has at least one merchant in it
except the newbie zone of an evil race.
Everfrost has the merchants in the tunnel
Steamfont has many merchants
Butcherblock has many merchants
Greater Fay has the entire city of Kelethin open to Wood and High elves
Lesser Fay has the Ranger camp
Qeynos Hills has the house in the middle
Misty Thicket has the halfling huts
The Commonlands...
Kithicor...
The Karanas ....

Why did Verant think it necessary to FORCE a character of an evil race to
zone into a city to sell loot from the associated newbie zone? That has
been bugging me for quite a bit. I hate having to zone to sell. The major
factor here is that it takes me 2-2.5 minutes to zone one way. If it only
took me 30 seconds like it does my wife, I may not have thought it a big
deal. It may be an oversight by Verant, but I don't think it is a "fair"
way of doing things. The all-or-none principle comes to mind here.
End of rant.

Please respond to this one Brian, even if it is a "I don't know".
Anyone out there think this is worthy of a Petition?
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous
